titleStmt.title: Fifteen loyal queries for the Kings most excellent Majesty, and the three kngdoms [sic]. With a lash for the quondam jugler of state, W.L. Sp. Mr. R. Sec. and the rest of the grand and notorious traytors who thirsted after the blood of his sacred Majestie King Charles. By J. Bramstone Esq;
titleStmt.author: Bramstone, J.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for G. Horton, living near the three Crowns in Barbican,

notesStmt.note: W.L. Sp. = William Lenthall Speaker of the House. -- Thomason catalog.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
